github_body:
General changes:
* #301 Added a 'Publish' and 'Unpublish' options from the route overview page's Actions.

Bugfixes:
* #296 Killzone was not synced properly in a pull when using collaborative route editing.
* #298 New accounts did not have their color for collaborative route editing set (was empty). This has been rectified.

MDT importer changes:
* #295 MDT importer now imports Awakened Obelisks and where you pulled them.

Team changes:
* #301 Added a 'Clone to team' and 'Clone to my profile' button.
discord_body:
v3.0.2 (2020/05/24)(https://keystone.guru/release/v3.0.2)
General changes:
    * #301 Added a 'Publish' and 'Unpublish' options from the route overview page's Actions.

Bugfixes:
    * #296 Killzone was not synced properly in a pull when using collaborative route editing.
    * #298 New accounts did not have their color for collaborative route editing set (was empty). This has been rectified.

MDT importer changes:
    * #295 MDT importer now imports Awakened Obelisks and where you pulled them.

Team changes:
    * #301 Added a 'Clone to team' and 'Clone to my profile' button.
reddit_body:
[https://keystone.guru/release/v3.0.2](https://keystone.guru/release/v3.0.2)

General changes:
* [\#301](https://github.com/Wotuu/keystone.guru/issues/301) Added a 'Publish' and 'Unpublish' options from the route overview page's Actions.

Bugfixes:
* [\#296](https://github.com/Wotuu/keystone.guru/issues/296) Killzone was not synced properly in a pull when using collaborative route editing.
* [\#298](https://github.com/Wotuu/keystone.guru/issues/298) New accounts did not have their color for collaborative route editing set (was empty). This has been rectified.

MDT importer changes:
* [\#295](https://github.com/Wotuu/keystone.guru/issues/295) MDT importer now imports Awakened Obelisks and where you pulled them.

Team changes:
* [\#301](https://github.com/Wotuu/keystone.guru/issues/301) Added a 'Clone to team' and 'Clone to my profile' button.

changes.change: Added a 'Publish' and 'Unpublish' options from the route overview page's Actions.
Killzone was not synced properly in a pull when using collaborative route editing.
New accounts did not have their color for collaborative route editing set (was empty). This has been rectified.
MDT importer now imports Awakened Obelisks and where you pulled them.
Added a 'Clone to team' and 'Clone to my profile' button.
